role_description: An Ansible role that installs SDKMAN on Linux or macOS
role_description_full_overview: [SDKMAN](https://sdkman.io/) is a tool for managing parallel Versions of multiple Software Development Kits on any Unix based system. It provides a convenient command line interface for installing, switching, removing and listing Candidates.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs SDKMAN on Linux or macOS.
